abstract.text: A Quartz 2D drawing environment.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: type represents a Quartz 2D drawing destination. A graphics context contains drawing parameters and all device-specific information needed to render the paint on a page to the destination, whether the destination is a window in an application, a bitmap image, a PDF document, or a printer.
